DataElement.preferredName: Oral Injury Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Present Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no/unknown indicator related to presence of damage inflicted to the mouth area prior to self-reported area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Oral Injury Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to presence of damage inflicted to the mouth area prior to self-reported area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Oral; of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.:Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Concepts.definition: Of, or relating to, or affecting, or for use in the mouth.
Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Property.preferredName: Patient Self-Report Prior Osteonecrosis of Jaw Present
Property.preferredDefinition: Subjective reports made by the patient:Earlier in time or order.:An area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Subjective reports made by a patient.
An area of necrotic bone in the mandible or maxilla.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Since the year 2000, did you

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
